oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ion irradiation-induced modifications in the surface morphology of Ge20Se74Bi6 thin films
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SHARMA, P
VASHISTHA, A
GANESAN, V
JAIN, IP
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: atomic-force microscopy
electrical-conductivity
silicon
glasses
chalcogenide
ion irradiation
thin films
atomic force microscopy
surface morphology
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The swift heavy ion-induced changes in the surface morphology of Ge20Se74Bi6 thin films are observed using atomic force microscopy. Ge20Si74Bi6 thin films were irradiated with Ni ion of 75 MeV energy and the beam current during irradiation was 5 pnA and fluence was varied for different samples from 5 x 10(12) to 10(14) ions/cm(2). The AFM micrographs indicate special features on the surface resulting from electronic energy loss. (c) 2007
